pageContext.claim: “Just out, highest ever Approval Rating overall in the new Gallup Poll, and shows 'Trump beating Sleepy Joe Biden.'”
pageContext.analysis: The Gallup poll has bounced around a lot, with Trump hitting 49 percent approval in early April, dropping six points to 43 percent in mid-April and then back to 49 percent in early May. He still has not cracked 50 percent approval rating. There appears to be no Gallup poll showing Trump beating Biden. In the RealClearPolitics list of head-to-head polls, Trump was trailing in 28 out 30 polls taken since mid-February. (He was tied in two polls.)
